script.title: Good work!
script.body:
Our algorithm is adjusting its recommendations based on your interactions and other data such as:
  • watch time
  • scrolling patterns
  • what people with similar profiles liked
  • your behavior on other sites

script.title: Great!
script.body:
We use the data we're collecting to make some assumptions.

Outside this simulation, this can include your age, location, or hobbies, leading to recommendations that may feel eerily specific.

More transparency might help you understand how we got there:

script.title: Got it.
script.body:
There can be a mismatch between the signals the algorithm picks up on and what we think they mean. This can result in inaccurate assumptions about your demographics or interests.

For more transparency, we'll share the data that goes into these profiles.

This is based on feedback loops between the algorithm's recommendations and your interactions.

Click below to see how we've been weighing your different interactions:

These weightings depend on what content and behavior our company prioritizes.

We're experimenting with giving users more control. You can drag the bars above to change what the algorithm values.

script.title: Almost there!
script.body:
We hope that being more transparent gives you better understanding and control.

To give you more choices, we're prototyping a feature where you can select from a number of algorithms designed by other people.
